subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous historical fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में कई पुराने संग्रहणों और निष्कारणों के विवरण के लिए
explanation_en: Amber Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a famous historical monument located in Jaipur. It is built on a hill and is best known for its unique architectural design.
explanation_en_alt: Hawa Mahal, known as the Wind Palace, is a beautiful palace located in Jaipur. It is famous for its intricate carvings and design.
explanation_en_alt2: City Palace, located in the heart of Jaipur, is a blend of Rajasthani and Mughal architectural styles. It is a popular tourist destination.
explanation_en_alt3: Nahargarh Fort, built by Maharaja Sangram Singh II, is a famous fort located in Jaipur. It provides a panoramic view of the city.
